message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is worth a lot to you. I'm offering it to you for $9,500.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to come down that low.  I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,250.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. However, I am still unable to pay $9,250 for the product. I would like to offer $9,100. I hope this is acceptable.
